segments.source_content:
---
slug: /171
title: "This Week In React #171: Expo, React Conf, React 19 preview, Next.js, React-Email, Storybook, Panda, Nexar, React-Query, TypeScript, Vocs, Skottie, Harmony, VisionOS..."
authors: [slorber, bndkt]
date: 01-24-2024
---
Hi everyone!

This week the official React conf has been announced. Co-hosted with Callstack, I hope for React Native to be well-covered! React 19 is coming, and we continue to get sneak peeks into upcoming features such as proper Web Components support. I wouldn't be surprised to see it being released during the conf alongside React Forget 🤞.

translations.ja: 今週、公式Reactカンファレンスが発表されました。Callstackと共催で、React Nativeもしっかりカバーされることを期待しています！React 19が間近に迫り、Web Componentsの正式サポートなど新機能の先行公開が続いています。React Forgetと共にカンファレンス期間中にリリースされる可能性も十分あるでしょう🤞。

segments.source_content: In other news, this week is full of interesting articles and releases, including Next.js, React-Emails...

translations.ja: その他のニュースとしては、今週はNext.jsやReact-Emailsなど興味深い記事やリリースが目白押しです...

segments.source_content: The React Native world has woken up with an impressive Expo SDK 50 release, and Expo Router v3 becoming the very first universal full-stack React framework.

translations.ja: React Native界隈では、印象的なExpo SDK 50のリリースと、Expo Router v3が初のユニバーサルなフルスタックReactフレームワークとして登場しました。

segments.source_content: <!-- truncate -->
**💡 [Check this newsletter on Twitter](https://slo.im/thread) - visual format 🎨**

translations.ja: **💡 [このニュースレターをTwitterでチェック](https://slo.im/thread) - ビジュアルフォーマット🎨**

segments.source_content: import Support from "@site/newsletter/_support.mdx";
<Support />
## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor1}
[![Axiom - the best logging platform for Vercel apps](/emails/issues/171/axiom.jpg)](https://axiom.co/vercel)

translations.ja: [![Axiom - Vercelアプリ向け最高のロギングプラットフォーム](/emails/issues/171/axiom.jpg)](https://axiom.co/vercel)

segments.source_content: **[Axiom - the best logging platform for Vercel apps](https://axiom.co/vercel)**

translations.ja: **[Axiom - Vercelアプリ向け最高のロギングプラットフォーム](https://axiom.co/vercel)**

segments.source_content: 😴 Sleep peacefully knowing that Axiom’s zero-config observability for Vercel projects has you covered.

translations.ja: 😴 AxiomのVercelプロジェクト向けゼロ設定オブザーバビリティがあれば、安心して眠れます。

segments.source_content:
* Use Axiom's pre-built dashboard for an overview across all your Vercel logs and vitals, drill down to specific projects and deployments, and get insight on how functions are performing with a single click.
* [next-axiom](https://github.com/axiomhq/next-axiom) allows you to send logs and events from any part of your Next.js projects - client, edge, or server-side - without any special configuration.
* Easily send structured logs directly from your code and analyze them together with Vercel logs.

translations.ja:
* Axiomの事前構築済みダッシュボードで、すべてのVercelログとバイタルを一覧表示し、特定のプロジェクトやデプロイメントをドリルダウンし、ワンクリックで関数のパフォーマンスを把握できます。
* [next-axiom](https://github.com/axiomhq/next-axiom)を使用すると、特別な設定なしにNext.jsプロジェクトのクライアント、エッジ、サーバーサイドのどこからでもログやイベントを送信できます。
* コードから構造化ログを簡単に送信し、Vercelログと一緒に分析できます。

segments.source_content: Axiom efficiently captures 100% of your event data so you’ll never have to worry about sampling or retention, and you’ll never have to guess what your users are experiencing.

translations.ja: Axiomはイベントデータの100%を効率的にキャプチャするため、サンプリングや保持について心配する必要はなく、ユーザー体験を推測する必要もありません。

segments.source_content: **PS**: [I use it myself to monitor the newsletter signups](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1528666563452317696) 😉

translations.ja: **追記**: [私自身もニュースレターの登録状況を監視するために使用しています](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1528666563452317696) 😉

segments.source_content: ## ⚛️ React {#react}
[![Next.js App Router Training](/emails/issues/171/appRouterTraining.jpg)](https://nextjs-app-router-training.vercel.app/)
**[Next.js App Router Training](https://nextjs-app-router-training.vercel.app/)**

A playground with a quite exhaustive list of interactive demos about Next.js features. This is a great resource to understand how the Next.js App Router behaves by actually seeing it running with a convenient way to browse the related code.

translations.ja: Next.js機能に関するインタラクティブなデモの網羅的なリストを備えたプレイグラウンド。Next.js App Routerの動作を実際に動かしながら理解できる優れたリソースで、関連コードを閲覧する便利な方法も提供されています。

segments.source_content:
* 💸 [Accelerate your workflow with MightyMeld, a visual dev tool for React codebases. Drag, drop, click, and prompt your UI into place while you hand-code the rest of it.](https://www.mightymeld.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact4\&utm_medium=newsletter\&utm_campaign=1\&utm_content=top)
* 📅 [React Conf 2024:](https://conf.react.dev/) the official conf is back May 15-16 in Henderson (Nevada/USA), in collaboration with Callstack.
* 👀 [React core - Web Components / custom element support is ready for React 19](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/11347#issuecomment-1899140345)
* 👀 [Nexar: application architecture for Next.js App Router apps](https://nexar.dev/): An opinionated set of patterns and conventions to build scalable Next.js apps, including a full open-source application.
* 🐦 [React-Forget is written in TypeScript/Babel. It will eventually be rewritten in Rust later, or compiled to native with Static Hermes!](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov2/status/1747640983980806466) 🙉
* 📜 [New client-side hooks coming to React 19](https://marmelab.com/blog/2024/01/23/react-19-new-hooks.html): Overview of new React hooks and APIs coming in the next major that you will be able to use without a framework.
* 📜 [The Query Options API](https://tkdodo.eu/blog/the-query-options-api): Dominik explains the advantages of removing React-Query overloads in v5, and using a single unified options object that you can reuse across all React-Query APIs thanks to TypeScript duck typing. The usage of a fancy TypeScript DataTag technique greatly improves the DX 🙉.
* 📜 [Panda v1 Roadmap](https://www.adebayosegun.com/blog/panda-v1-roadmap): the CSS-in-JS lib is progressing toward a v1 release. It has already optimized its runtime and integrated Lightning CSS. Remaining tasks include Panda Studio (to vizualize design tokens), opacity modifiers, container queries, config validation…
* 📜 [Wrangling Tuple Types](https://kyleshevlin.com/wrangling-tuple-types/): Explains why you might want to use TypeScript “as const” while returning tuples from custom React hooks.
* 📜 [Build a Next.js app in Storybook with React Server Components and Mock Service Worker](https://storybook.js.org/blog/build-a-nextjs-app-with-rsc-msw-storybook/): The RSC support coming with Storybook 8 permits to develop a full Next.js app in isolation.
* 📜 [Build an app with Remix and Bun](https://sergiodxa.com/tutorials/build-an-app-with-remix-and-bun): It’s possible to use Bun at runtime, but for now you have to keep building the Remix app with Node.
* 📜 [Harmony - A new kind of color picker for React](https://polar.sh/emilwidlund/posts/a-new-kind-of-color-picker-with-react-typescript): New fancy React color picker package, that matches multiple colors together according to harmonies.
* 📜 [RSC is React Server + Component](https://bobaekang.com/blog/rsc-is-react-server-plus-component/): Gives you an interesting mental model to understand RSCs.
* 📜 [From Next.js to Rails then Elixir: My journey through React.js burnout](https://dev.to/danielbergholz/from-nextjs-to-rails-then-elixir-my-journey-through-reactjs-burnout-h8d)
* 📜 [Detailed React. Reconciliation, Renderers, Fiber, Virtual Tree](https://blog.frontend-almanac.com/JqtGelofzm1)
* 📜 [Shining a light on Caustics with Shaders and React Three Fiber](https://blog.maximeheckel.com/posts/caustics-in-webgl/)
* 📜 [Mastering React and OpenLayers Integration: A Comprehensive Guide](https://mxd.codes/articles/how-to-create-a-web-map-with-open-layers-and-react)
* 📜 [Optimizing images for Next.js sites with imgproxy and docker](https://mxd.codes/articles/optimizing-images-for-next-js-sites-with-imgproxy-and-docker)
* 📦 [dream-css-tool - styled-components, but without a client runtime. Built for Next.js](https://github.com/joshwcomeau/dream-css-tool): Josh Comeau explores creating his own CSS-in-JS lb.
* 📦 [React Email 2.0 - New preview experience, improved performance, CodeBlock component](https://resend.com/blog/react-email-2)…
* 📦 [Next.js 14.1 - Improving DX, Turbopack, self-hosting, history APIs, image component, parallel and intercepted routes…](https://nextjs.org/blog/next-14-1)
* 📦 [Zustand 4.5 - getInitialState to prevent hydration mismatches](https://github.com/pmndrs/zustand/releases/tag/v4.5.0)
* 📦 [Relay 16.2 - @preloadable directive](https://github.com/facebook/relay/releases/tag/v16.2.0)
* 📦 [Astro 4.2 - Prerendering using Speculation Rules API, customizable image optimization](https://astro.build/blog/astro-420/)…
* 📦 [vocs - Minimal Documentation Framework, powered by React + Vite](https://github.com/wevm/vocs)
* 📦 [ReScript 11.0 - React lazy components](https://rescript-lang.org/blog/release-11-0-0)
* 🎥 [Lee Robinson - Next.js App Router Caching: Explained!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VBlSe8tvg4U)
* 🎥 [Lee Robinson - Deploying Next.js to Vercel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AiiGjB2AxqA)
* 🎥 [Ben Holmes - React form validation explained - Next.js and Astro](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DwEkvie79xI)

## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor2}
[![FormBuilder SDK for React](/emails/issues/171/tripetto.jpg)](https://tripetto.com/sdk/this-week-in-react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=sponsor\&utm_campaign=sdk)
**[FormBuilder SDK for React](https://tripetto.com/sdk/this-week-in-react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=sponsor\&utm_campaign=sdk)**

A complete form solution for React projects, used by Fortune 500 companies. With easy-to-use open-source components for building and running powerful forms inside your React app. Extensively documented, up in minutes, and deeply customizable.

translations.ja: Fortune 500企業でも採用されているReactプロジェクト向けの完全なフォームソリューションです。Reactアプリ内で強力なフォームを構築・実行するための使いやすいオープンソースコンポーネントを提供します。詳細なドキュメントがあり、数分でセットアップ可能で、高度なカスタマイズが可能です。

* 強力なフォームを作成するビルダー
* フォームをデプロイしデータを収集するランナー
* 柔軟なフォームレイアウト（会話型、チャット型など）とスタイリング
* カスタム質問タイプで拡張可能
* 完全なドキュメント、例、デモ
* 外部依存なしでセルフホスティング可能
* 無料で開始、テスト、完璧な仕上げが可能

segments.source_content: TWIR exclusive: [Get 25% off your FormBuilder SDK license](https://tripetto.com/sdk/this-week-in-react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=sponsor\&utm_campaign=sdk).

translations.ja: TWIR限定: [FormBuilder SDKライセンスを25%オフで入手](https://tripetto.com/sdk/this-week-in-react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=sponsor\&utm_campaign=sdk)。

segments.source_content: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}
This week’s React Native news is compiled by Benedikt. Feedback, suggestions or news to share? Let me know on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/bndkt).

translations.ja: 今週のReact NativeニュースはBenediktがまとめました。フィードバック、提案、共有したいニュースがあれば[Twitter](https://twitter.com/bndkt)でお知らせください。

segments.source_content: [![Expo SDK 50](/emails/issues/171/expo50.jpg)](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-18-sdk-50k)
**[Expo SDK 50](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-18-sdk-50)**

Expo SDK 50 introduces Expo Dev Tools Plugins, comes with new SQLite and Camera APIs, and adds `@expo/fingerprint`, a new way to determine whether an updated JS bundle update is compatible with a given native build. This release also marks the [end of Webpack support](https://blog.expo.dev/webpack-support-in-expo-cli-is-now-deprecated-e9831d7eb631) in Expo, which is now deprecated in favor of Metro. The best and most convenient way to get up to speed on Expo 50 is probably to watch Simon rattle through it in about 15 minutes on [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=shaGaiwu4Fg).

translations.ja: Expo SDK 50ではExpo Dev Toolsプラグインが導入され、新しいSQLiteとCamera APIが追加されました。また、`@expo/fingerprint`が追加され、更新されたJSバンドルが特定のネイティブビルドと互換性があるかどうかを判断する新しい方法が提供されます。このリリースでは、Expoでの[Webpackサポートの終了](https://blog.expo.dev/webpack-support-in-expo-cli-is-now-deprecated-e9831d7eb631)も発表され、Metroが推奨されるようになりました。Expo 50について最も手軽に学ぶには、Simonが約15分で解説する[YouTube動画](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=shaGaiwu4Fg)を視聴するのがおすすめです。

segments.source_content: [![Expo Router v3](/emails/issues/171/router3.jpg)](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-23-router-3)
**[Expo Router v3](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-23-router-3)**

Along with Expo SDK 50, Expo Router v3 has been released. It brings lots of performance and stability improvements and comes with better docs. Most notably, there is now experimental support for building universal server endpoints with API Routes. Expo Router is now the very first universal, full-stack React framework!

translations.ja: Expo SDK 50とともに、Expo Router v3がリリースされました。多くのパフォーマンスと安定性の改善が行われ、ドキュメントも充実しました。特に注目すべきは、APIルートを使用したユニバーサルサーバーエンドポイントの実験的サポートが追加されたことです。Expo Routerは今や、最初のユニバーサルなフルスタックReactフレームワークとなりました！

segments.source_content:
* 💸 [Moropo - Power Up Your Mobile UI Tests with support for 2FA, Google Play, Offline Mode and Tablets ](https://www.moropo.com?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_medium=emails\&utm_campaign=twir-20240124)
* 🐦 [Blur VisionOS demo](https://twitter.com/o_kwasniewski/status/1747976103505821946): `@react-native-community/blur` now supports visionOS.
* 📖 [Expo Docs: Use Bun](https://docs.expo.dev/guides/using-bun/): Bun is (rightfully) all the rage right now and it works great with Expo!
* 📜 [Webpack support in Expo CLI is now deprecated](https://blog.expo.dev/webpack-support-in-expo-cli-is-now-deprecated-e9831d7eb631): Time to move to Metro, the universal bundler for React Native and Expo Web. There are also [docs for migrating](https://docs.expo.dev/router/migrate/from-expo-webpack/).
* 📜 [Xcode 15.2 image is now available on EAS Build](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-18-eas-build-xcode-15.2-image)
* 📜 [React Native Video on visionOS](https://thewidlarzgroup.com/react-native-video-on-visionos/): react-native-video will be able to render video on Apple’s Vision Pro.
* 📜 [Our React Native toolbox: 24 essential tools for developers in 2024](https://thewidlarzgroup.com/24-react-native-tools-for-2024/): Good overview of the tools landscape, from IDEs to debugging and tracing.
* 📜 [How to set video as a background in React Native application](https://thewidlarzgroup.com/video-background-with-react-native-video/)
* 📦 [React Native Storybook v7 alpha](https://github.com/storybookjs/react-native/releases/tag/v7.6.10-alpha.0): Now compatible with the latest Storybook 7.6.1 and featuring dynamic story imports.
* 📦 [react-native-skottie - run Lottie animations using Skia's GPU-accelerated engine](https://github.com/margelo/react-native-skottie)
* 📦 [nativecn-ui - An effort to port the popular shadcn-ui to React Native](https://github.com/Mobilecn-UI/nativecn-ui)
* 📦 [react-native-fast-tflite 1.1 - Upgrades to latest TensorFlow Lite](https://github.com/mrousavy/react-native-fast-tflite/releases/tag/v1.1.0)
* 🎙️ [RNR 285 - Expo Dominates the App Store (and other news)](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-285-expo-dominates-the-app-store-and-other-news)
* 🎙️ [Rocket Ship 26 - React Server Components for React Native with Szymon Rybczak](https://podcast.galaxies.dev/episodes/026-react-server-components-for-react-native-with-szymon-rybczak)
* 🎥 [William Candillon - 3D transformations with React Native Skia](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pYu3DiWYtL0)
* 🎥 [Catalin Miron - create-expo-app -w with-router-tailwind](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RsFoOlYj-gc\&themeRefresh=1)
* 🎥 [Simon Grimm - The Worlds Best Apps use React Native](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIMyd5FoKyc)

* 🐦 [Blur VisionOS デモ](https://twitter.com/o_kwasniewski/status/1747976103505821946): `@react-native-community/blur` が visionOS をサポートしました。
* 📖 [Expo ドキュメント: Bun の使用](https://docs.expo.dev/guides/using-bun/): Bun は現在大流行しており、Expo と相性が良いです！
* 📜 [Expo CLI での Webpack サポートは非推奨になりました](https://blog.expo.dev/webpack-support-in-expo-cli-is-now-deprecated-e9831d7eb631): React Native と Expo Web のユニバーサルバンドラーである Metro への移行時期です。[移行ドキュメント](https://docs.expo.dev/router/migrate/from-expo-webpack/)も公開されています。
* 📜 [EAS Build で Xcode 15.2 イメージが利用可能に](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/01-18-eas-build-xcode-15.2-image)
* 📜 [React Native Video on visionOS](https://thewidlarzgroup.com/react-native-video-on-visionos/): react-native-video が Apple の Vision Pro でビデオをレンダリングできるようになります。
* 📜 [React Native ツールボックス: 2024年開発者向け24の必須ツール](https://thewidlarzgroup.com/24-react-native-tools-for-2024/): IDE からデバッグ、トレースまで、ツールの概要を把握できます。
* 📜 [React Native アプリでビデオを背景に設定する方法](https://thewidlarzgroup.com/video-background-with-react-native-video/)
* 📦 [React Native Storybook v7 アルファ版](https://github.com/storybookjs/react-native/releases/tag/v7.6.10-alpha.0): 最新の Storybook 7.6.1 と互換性があり、動的ストーリーインポートをサポート。

* 📦 [nativecn-ui - 人気の shadcn-ui を React Native に移植する試み](https://github.com/Mobilecn-UI/nativecn-ui)
* 📦 [react-native-fast-tflite 1.1 - 最新の TensorFlow Lite にアップグレード](https://github.com/mrousavy/react-native-fast-tflite/releases/tag/v1.1.0)
* 🎙️ [RNR 285 - Expo が App Store を席巻（その他のニュース）](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-285-expo-dominates-the-app-store-and-other-news)
* 🎙️ [Rocket Ship 26 - Szymon Rybczak と React Native 向け React Server Components](https://podcast.galaxies.dev/episodes/026-react-server-components-for-react-native-with-szymon-rybczak)

segments.source_content: ## 🤭 Fun {#fun}
[![alt](/emails/issues/171/meme.jpg)](https://twitter.com/trashh_dev/status/1750233852553924709)
See ya! 👋
